Types of graphs.Sparse: Only a small fraction of vertex pairs
Types of graphs.Directed/undirected: Edges are one way or 2 way
Types of graphs.Embedded: Geometric position of vertices and edges have meaning
Types of graphs.Implicit/explicit: Graph is fully represented, or conceptual
Types of graphs.Labelled/unlabelled: Each vertex is associated with a unique identifier or it has no identifier

Adjacency matrix: A 2d array to represent a graph
Adjacency list: A list to represent a graph
Degree: The number of edges entering a vertex plus the number of edges leaving
